document.full_text: lights started going off around the world on saturday in a show of support for renewable energy, given added poignancy by japan's nuclear disaster, which raises doubts about nuclear power as a possible solution.
document.title: japan nuclear crisis gives earth hour added poignancy
lines_and_colors: lights started going off around the world on saturday in a show of support for renewable energy, given added poignancy by japan's nuclear disaster, which raises doubts about nuclear power as a possible solution.
